question: Which state approves Rs 7546 crore Narmada, Parvati river linking project?
explanation: Madhya Pradesh State Government has approved Rs 7546-crore project for linking Narmada River with Parvati River. This project aims to create irrigation facilities on two lakh hectares of agriculture land in Malwa region of Madhya Pradesh. The project is to be implemented in four phases, wherein each phase will create irrigation facilities on at least 50000 hectares of agricultural land.
